name: Sonic Relations
description:
———————————————————————————————————————

Please do not play this fan game if you are under 17, have epilepsy, depression or other mental disorders, or if you are an impressionable person!

———————————————————————————————————————

This visual novel tells the story of a deeper relationship between Sonic and Shadow, whose development changes depending on the player's choice: the hedgehogs either become friends or dislike each other.

They experience different situations depending on the level of their relationship, changing their views on each other.

However, is the plot in this game as simple as it seems?

The game is under development, with only a demo version available. The full potential has not yet been revealed, the demo shows only a small part!! Russian/English languages !
However, I apologize in advance for the broken grammar in English.
